All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdminController
The AdminController class manages administrative actions such as creating, updating, and deleting users.
AdminRepository
Repository class for managing users with admin rights.
AdminService
Service class for managing administrative tasks related to users.
AppContext
AppContext is a singleton class that acts as the central configuration and dependency injection container for the application.
ConsoleUI
An abstract class that defines constants for console text formatting.
DashboardAdminVue
The DashboardAdminVue class represents the admin dashboard interface in the console application.
DashboardUserVue
The DashboardUserVue class represents the user dashboard interface in the console application.
DashboardVue
The DashboardVue class serves as an abstract base class for creating various dashboard views for different types of users (e.g., admin, regular user).
LoginController
The LoginController class handles user login and redirection to appropriate dashboards.
LoginRepository
Repository class for managing login operations and user retrieval.
LoginService
Service class for handling user login and authentication.
LoginVue
The LoginVue class is responsible for managing the user interface for logging in to the system.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
Order
Represents an Order in the system.
OrderController
Controller class to handle operations related to orders within the application.
OrderRepository
Repository class for managing orders.
OrderService
Service class for managing orders and products.
OrderVue
The OrderVue class represents the view for managing orders in the system.
Product
Represents a Product in the shopping system.
ProductController
Controller class to manage product-related operations within the application.
ProductRepository
Repository class for managing product data.
ProductService
Service class for managing products.
User
Represents a User in the system.
